Name: FC Purge 4.5.3.6
checklistText:
<size=21>4.5.3.6 FC Power Plant Purging</size>

	1 	O2 purging
Panel 3		FC IND sel 						- 1, 2, or 3
			FC 1, 2, or 3 PURG 				- O2 (2 min)
			FC O2 FLOW ind 				- flow incr 0.6 lb/hr
			FC 1, 2, or 3 PURG 				- OFF

	2 	H2 purging
			H2 PURG LINE  HTR 				- on (up), 20 min	prior to 
											purge
			FC IND sel 						- 1, 2, or 3
			FC 1, 2, or 3 PURG 				- H2
				(1 min, 20 sec)
			FC H2 FLOW ind 				- flow incr 0.67 lb/hr
Panel 1, 3, 122:
			MASTER ALARM pb/lt (3) 		- on
			MASTER ALARN pb/lt 			- push
			MASTER ALARM PB/LT (3) 		- out

Panel 2		FC 1, 2, or 3 lt 				- on (until norm flow 
											restored)
Panel 3		FC 1, 2, or 3 PURG 				- OFF
			After â‰ˆ10 min
				H2 PURG LINE HTR 			- OFF
